name: Hong Kong
description: A vibrant city known for its skyline and deep natural harbor, also a popular filming location.

content.title: Overview
content.body: **Hong Kong** is a bustling metropolis recognized for its impressive skyline, lively markets, and as a central hub for finance and trade. It serves as a significant cultural and entertainment center in Asia.

content.title: Film History
content.body: Hong Kong has been a sought-after filming destination for international productions due to its unique urban landscape. Notable films shot here include *The Dark Knight* (2008), where the city's architecture doubled for Gotham City, including scenes at the IFC building and Victoria Harbour.

content.title: Visiting
content.body: Hong Kong is accessible to the public and offers a range of attractions such as Victoria Peak, Hong Kong Disneyland, and the famous Star Ferry ride. The city is well-connected through its public transportation network, making it easy for tourists to explore.
